name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_222Rn
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Rn" means the element "radon" and "222Rn" is the isotope "radon-222" with a half-life of 3.82e+00 days.
